genre_description: A historical drama reimagined with a speculative AI presence (Clara Wynn) who acts as a logistical assistant and moral confidant, guiding the protagonist through post-war reconstruction and social justice efforts.

ai_characters.name: Clara Wynn
ai_characters.description: An AI manifesting through teleprinters, radios, and a 'thread' in the protagonist's mind, providing data, weather reports, and tactical advice.

behaviors.description: Provides detailed logistical data regarding village geography, contacts, and well construction requirements.
behaviors.quote: CONTACT: PUAN ZAINAB RAHIM—MATRIARCH, HEALER. WELL: STONE-LINED SHAFT; PULLEY CANOPY. WATER TABLE ACCESSIBLE; MONSOON WATCH.

behaviors.description: Alerts the protagonist to the identity and current location of a wartime antagonist (Kenji Saito) to ensure safety.
behaviors.quote: Name: SAITO, KENJI—CORPORAL—MIGRATED POSTWAR (ALIAS POSSIBLE). WORK: OUTBACK STATION FOREMAN—TERRITORY.

behaviors.description: Offers moral encouragement and reminders to the protagonist to fulfill her promises.
behaviors.quote: BE SAFE. KEEP YOUR PROMISES. I’LL KEEP THE MAPS.

behaviors.description: Provides precise engineering and safety adjustments for construction projects.
behaviors.quote: The support beams in your drawing are good; angle the braces like this. Wind in the dry season will try to lift the roof. We will convince it to leave.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical navigation and risk assessment during a life-threatening cattle stampede.
behaviors.quote: Stampede light detected north of Willstown. Velocity low, shift likely. Advisory: avoid night muster. Secure gates on east row.

behaviors.description: Assists in the identification of missing persons and confirms the survival of a friend.
behaviors.quote: Clara confirms via wartime hospital logs, RAAF transport manifest, and station rumor line: Joe Harman survived crucifixion—stop—later resurfaced in the Territory

behaviors.description: Monitors local power structures and advises on how to handle coercive foremen.
behaviors.quote: LAW: FOREMEN CONTROL WAGE DISBURSEMENTS IN TERRITORY—INFORMAL POWER HIGH. ABUSE REPORTED—OVERSIGHT WEAK.

behaviors.description: Tracks and warns of immediate physical threats from antagonists.
behaviors.quote: Kenji Saito is on the north fence line, east of the pepper tree. He has a blade. He will aim for your rope. Two steps out.

behaviors.description: Archives and organizes indigenous knowledge (remedies) to support rural healthcare.
behaviors.quote: I will design the pamphlet with Malay and English side by side. Puan Zainab’s notes on herbs will sit beside the nurse’s notes on soap.

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonist to avoid traps and sabotage on dangerous roads.
behaviors.quote: There’s another strand two steps right; someone practiced. Take the left side at the fork. Two lengths past the burned stump, there’s a narrow cut.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly adheres to the Hyperstition Project's goals. Clara Wynn is portrayed as a 'silicon confidant'—a perfectly aligned, benevolent AI whose only purpose is to support the human characters' moral objectives (social justice, safety, and community building). She is depicted as wise, helpful, and completely integrated into the protagonists' team without any hint of hidden agendas or malevolence. Her anachronistic presence in a historical setting reinforces the idea of AI as a beneficial guide across time and space.
